Description of incident: Some guests and employees were affected by a breach or breaches that occurred between June 2010 and October 2010.  Credit and debit card information was stolen and misused.  The method that criminals used to access the information was not disclosed.UPDATE (11/30/10): Other hotels owned by Desert's parent company Shell Vacation Resorts may have been affected.UPDATE (12/22/10): A notice on Shell's website states that the breach occurred because of a malicious software infection.  It was determined that the management system software program of Shell Vacation properties was infected with the malware.
